name: Rocket Matter
overview:
Rocket Matter is legal productivity software. It is a web-based solution that addresses the practice management and time & billing needs of law firms. It’s goal is to help law firms increase productivity by working smarter.

Rocket Matter was designed from the ground up based on the naturally occurring workflows found in the legal industry. These workflows were derived from working with multiple law firms to better understand their everyday goals. The goal-centric design of the application helps increase efficiency by streamlining everyday tasks, saving time. In addition, the learning curve for learning to use application is significantly decreased.

Rocket Matter makes it seamless to bill time while you go about your usual activities. Every activity you perform, whether calendaring, tasks, documents, or other, is captured via Bill as you Workâ„¢ technology.
